name: The Integer Group
description: The Integer Group is one of the world's largest promotional, retail, and shopper marketing agency, and a key member of Omnicom Group Inc. Integer lives at the Intersection of Branding and SellingÂ®, driving transaction and creating seamless brand experiences for shoppers. Integer works with a broad set of clients across several categories that include retail, beverage, consumer packaged goods, telecommunications, home and shelter, automotive aftermarket, and power sports.
